value.title: Series Labels for Power BI Line Charts
value.excerpt: POWER BI SEPTEMBER 2021 FEATURE SUMMARY - SERIES LABELS FOR LINE CHARTS   Welcome to Power BI Desktop September 2021 feature summary. During this video, we will learn how we can add Series labels for the Line chart in Power BI. The steps are very simple and easy.  First, turn on the label for the series.

value.title: Show/Hide Multiple Data Values using TME AG Toggle Switch – Custom Visual – Toggle Switch by TME AG
value.excerpt: During this session, we will explore one of the custom visuals in Power BI which is TME AG Toggle Switch in Power BI.   Sometimes, we need to show/hide data values based on Toggle Switch. Let’s consider one real-life example where we need to show Weekend and Weekday data. I want to provide one switch

value.title: Small Multiples in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session on Small Multiples in Power BI. “Small Multiples”- a new feature rolled out during December 2020 Power BI Desktop Update. Small Multiples is available as a Preview feature at this moment. This is a very cool feature we can use with our stacked bar and column charts,
